passive.name: Stratagem
passive.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. When the wearer uses an attack and at least 2 attacked enemies have the corresponding Weakness, the wearer's CRIT DMG increases by <orangeStrong>{{2, percent}}%</orangeStrong>, lasting for {{3}} turn(s).
